article_title: Thomas Sowell commentary: It makes no sense to try to defund Obamacare

article_metadata.description: This has been the worst time, politically, for President Barack Obama since he took office. Recent polls reveal that public confidence in both his domestic and foreign policies has been falling, amid revelations about their defects and dangers.
